title: Broad-spectrum dengue virus detection using the commercial RealStar dengue RT-PCR kit 3.0 (Altona) and an in-house combined real-time RT-PCR assay
content:
Publication date: 30 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 10

Author(s): Léa Luciani, Pierre Combe, Franck Touret, Céline Gazin, Raphaëlle Klitting, Laura Pezzi, Laurence Thirion, Rémi Charrel, Gilda Grard, Xavier de Lamballerie, Antoine Nougairède
